amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 9(a) from the bill which relates to preservation of the right for judicial review of American inventors making application to the patent system.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 113-283 to strike 9(a) from the bill and reorder the remaining subsections of Section 9.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 260 - 156 (Roll no. 627).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Rohrabacher.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 260 - 156 (Roll no. 627).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
